author: kpedro88
body:
#### PR description:

Resolves #37894. 

#### PR validation:

Ran:
```
runTheMatrix.py -l 136.731 --ibeos
```
successfully at FNAL. Reran the printed commands in different scenarios (with and without `$PATH` modifications) and saw desired output.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

No immediate plans to backport, but can do so on request.
title: Simplify and generalize ibeos
